General.Name: Grupo Empresas Navieras SA
General.Description: Grupo Empresas Navieras S.A., an investment company, provides maritime transport services worldwide. The company provides maritime carriage, which include 9,000 and 3,100 TEUs full container vessels; tanker vessels for clean products; ferries for people, vehicles, and cargo; pilot launches; and wellboats to support the salmon industry and tugboats. It operates network of port terminals; provides agency services; logistics services; and engages in airport operations. Grupo Empresas Navieras S.A. was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.
